title: Customer Service Agent
description: Provided front-line customer support for a wireless internet service provider, assisting residential and business clients with technical issues, account management, and service inquiries. Ensured a smooth and responsive experience for users across various communication channels.

title: Technical Support
description: Served as a Network Technician Intern, focusing on network installation and maintenance, including configuring network devices, troubleshooting connectivity issues, and providing technical support. Contributed to improving network performance and ensuring seamless operations for clients.

title: Technical Support
description: Worked as a Network Technician Intern, assisting in fiber optic network design and installation, wireless point-to-point network setup, and LAN troubleshooting. Gained hands-on experience in maintaining and optimizing network infrastructure to ensure stable and efficient connectivity.
